title: "‘Tech trends like AI can be hyped sometimes’"
excerpt: "Innovation at the startup level is critical to the economy and it can create an ecosystem of entrepreneurship, but trends like artificial intelligence (AI) can “become somewhat of hype\" if seen as an end itself, a top Microsoft India executive said."
